li.p: 1. Pop - this shows the population in your residences. This figure does not include the homeless.
2. Housed - this shows the total number of people in your city that live in residences.
3. Housed % - this shows the percentage of your city that live in residences.
4. Shanties - this shows the number of shanty towns in your city.
5. Unn Dths - this shows the number of people that died through starvation or from pollution, in the last month.
6. Unemp % - this shows the percentage of your population that is unemployed.
7. Starv % - this shows the percentage of your population that is starving.
Left clicking on this window will cycle through windows for finance, other costs and housing.
